name: Friendango
description: A social network for movie reviews that enables a user to submit their own reviews and view data about the reviews submitted either by all users or by only the users they follow.
technologies: Node.js, Express, Handlebars, MySQL, Sequelize, JavaScript, jQuery, Heroku, JawsDB, OMDB API, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Chart.js, ESLint, Dotenv, Passport

name: PetSpiration
description: A responsive application that helps users decide what type of pet they want, matches users with available shelter animals, and then provides directions to the animal shelter.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Hammer.js, Petfinder API, Google Maps API, Geolocation API

name: Employee Directory
description: A responsive, single-page React employee directory application that enables sorting and filtering employee data using React props, stateful and stateless components.

name: Transaction Tracker
description: An online/offline Progressive Web App that tracks account balance, withdrawals, and deposits. Data entered in offline mode is stored client-side in IndexedDB, then stored server-side in MongoDB once online again.
technologies: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, IndexedDB, JavaScript, Chart.js, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

name: Burger Logger
description: A responsive, RESTful Node.js/Express app using MySQL as a database and Handlebars to serve HTML that enables users to read, create, update, and delete data about burgers.
technologies: MySQL, Node.js, Express, Handlebars, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, Bootstrap, HTML

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather dashboard that utilizes local storage, geolocation, and the OpenWeather API.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Moment.js, OpenWeather API, Geolocation API
